name: Amazon
author: Scraggles
notes:
First time KOG!! Played Dinos to Legend every season up until now, 86 wins because I didnt play last month so the grind was from Gold 1. Hit level 45 with Mai then started the climb.
special thanks to @BlackJesus for helping me practice the Sylvan matchup which was arguably the hardest matchup I faced on the ladder. Chalice/DWrath hands down the best techs for the current meta right now
